title: Strictly fans mesmerised by Alex and Neil's sizzling chemistry after 'curse rumours'
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Strictly Come Dancing fans were left mesmerised tonight by Alex Scott and Neil Jones' sizzling chemistry during their intense Tango this evening.

Earlier this week, the pair sparked 'curse rumours' after they were spotted going back to Alex's house after a glam night out.

The couple were involved in a dramatic Tango, which saw her cloaked om black and leaping off a motorbike in the studio.

Alex's fiery persona came out as the pair wowed in the studio.

Despite her later appearing to make a dig at the curse rumours, remarking that they can "now be friends", fans were convinced about the chemistry between them.

(Image: DIGITAL/EROTEME.CO.UK)

One tweeted: "That chemistry between Neil and Alex tho #Strictly #StrictlyComeDancing."

While another commented: "I really like Alex and Neil. They have a great connection #Strictly."

A third remarked: "That's it, I'm officially in the queue for Alex! That was SO sexy! She's really improving dance wise too, woohoo #strictly."

Alex and Neil had been rehearsing all day earlier this week and later went out for a big night out in the city.

The pair were initially spotted heading to Alex's at around 5pm so they could change for their glamorous night out at the Royal Albert Hall to watch the International Ballroom Dancing Championships.

Later, the pair got a cab back to Alex's at 11pm and were seen entering her house together.

Tonight, the pair performed a sexy Tango to Fleetwood Mac's Go On You Own Way.

*Strictly returns tomorrow on BBC One
description: The Strictly Come Dancing pair sparked 'curse rumours' after they were spotted going back to Alex's house after a glam night out
